# unfollowExternalSyncDevice()

**Instance Method**

Discontinues external sync.

## Declaration

```swift
func unfollowExternalSyncDevice()
```

## Discussion

This method stops your input from syncing to the external sync device you specified in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDeviceInput/follow(_:videoFrameDuration:delegate:)].

## Synchronizing with external devices

- **isExternalSyncSupported**: Indicates whether the device input supports being configured to follow an external sync device.
- **follow(_:videoFrameDuration:delegate:)**: Configures the the device input to follow an external sync device at the given frame duration.
- **activeExternalSyncVideoFrameDuration**: The receiver’s external sync frame duration (the reciprocal of its frame rate) when being driven by an external sync device.
- **externalSyncDevice**: The external sync device currently being followed by this input.
